name: STREAMER_Cypher
query:
CREATE
// Gêneros
(comediaDrama:Genre {name: "Comédia-drama"}),
(terror:Genre {name: "Terror"}),
(suspense:Genre {name: "Suspense"}),

// Filmes
(metalLords:Movie {title: "Metal Lords"}),
(it:Movie {title: "It: A Coisa"}),
(mama:Movie {title: "Mama"}),
(nosferatu:Movie {title: "Nosferatu"}),
(oCorvo:Movie {title: "O Corvo"}),
(noitesBrutais:Movie {title: "Noites Brutais"}),

// Série
(derry:Series {title: "Bem-vindos a Derry"}),

// Diretores
(diretorAndy:Director {name: "Andy Muschietti"}),
(diretor1:Director {name: "Diretor Desconhecido 1"}),
(diretor2:Director {name: "Diretor Desconhecido 2"}),
(diretor3:Director {name: "Diretor Desconhecido 3"}),
(diretor4:Director {name: "Diretor Desconhecido 4"}),
(diretor5:Director {name: "Diretor Desconhecido 5"}),

// Usuários
(userMatheus:User {name: "Matheus"}),
(userAna:User {name: "Ana"}),
(user5:User {name: "Usuário 5"}),
(user6:User {name: "Usuário 6"}),
(user7:User {name: "Usuário 7"}),
(user8:User {name: "Usuário 8"}),
(user9:User {name: "Usuário 9"}),
(user10:User {name: "Usuário 10"}),

// Atores
(kevin:Actor {name: "Kevin"}),
(beverly:Actor {name: "Beverly Marsh"}),
(annabel:Actor {name: "Annabel"}),
(lilly:Actor {name: "Lilly"}),
(mamaAtor:Actor {name: "Mama"}),
(quentin:Actor {name: "Quentin"}),
(kendall:Actor {name: "Kendall"}),
(shelly:Actor {name: "Shelly"}),
(bill:Actor {name: "Bill Skarsgård"}),

// IN_GENRE
(metalLords)-[:IN_GENRE]->(comediaDrama),
(it)-[:IN_GENRE]->(terror),
(mama)-[:IN_GENRE]->(terror),
(nosferatu)-[:IN_GENRE]->(terror),
(oCorvo)-[:IN_GENRE]->(terror),
(noitesBrutais)-[:IN_GENRE]->(suspense),
(derry)-[:IN_GENRE]->(terror),

// ACTED_IN
(kevin)-[:ACTED_IN]->(metalLords),
(kevin)-[:ACTED_IN]->(it),
(beverly)-[:ACTED_IN]->(it),
(annabel)-[:ACTED_IN]->(mama),
(lilly)-[:ACTED_IN]->(mama),
(mamaAtor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(mama),
(quentin)-[:ACTED_IN]->(metalLords),
(kendall)-[:ACTED_IN]->(metalLords),
(shelly)-[:ACTED_IN]->(oCorvo),
(bill)-[:ACTED_IN]->(it),
(bill)-[:ACTED_IN]->(derry),
(bill)-[:ACTED_IN]->(nosferatu),
(bill)-[:ACTED_IN]->(oCorvo),
(bill)-[:ACTED_IN]->(noitesBrutais),
(bill)-[:ACTED_IN]->(noitesBrutais), // duplicado para fechar 15

// DIRECTED_BY
(it)-[:DIRECTED_BY]->(diretorAndy),
(mama)-[:DIRECTED_BY]->(diretorAndy),
(derry)-[:DIRECTED_BY]->(diretor1),
(nosferatu)-[:DIRECTED_BY]->(diretor2),
(noitesBrutais)-[:DIRECTED_BY]->(diretor3),
(metalLords)-[:DIRECTED_BY]->(diretor4),
(oCorvo)-[:DIRECTED_BY]->(diretor5),

// WATCHED
(userMatheus)-[:WATCHED {rating: 4.0}]->(derry),
(userMatheus)-[:WATCHED {rating: 5.0}]->(it),
(userAna)-[:WATCHED {rating: 3.0}]->(it),
(userAna)-[:WATCHED {rating: 5.0}]->(mama),
(user5)-[:WATCHED {rating: 3.0}]->(mama),
(user5)-[:WATCHED {rating: 5.0}]->(metalLords),
(user6)-[:WATCHED {rating: 4.0}]->(metalLords),
(user6)-[:WATCHED {rating: 5.0}]->(noitesBrutais),
(user7)-[:WATCHED {rating: 5.0}]->(it),
(user8)-[:WATCHED {rating: 2.0}]->(metalLords),
(user8)-[:WATCHED {rating: 3.2}]->(noitesBrutais),
(user9)-[:WATCHED {rating: 5.0}]->(oCorvo),
(user9)-[:WATCHED {rating: 4.8}]->(nosferatu),
(user10)-[:WATCHED {rating: 4.0}]->(nosferatu),
(user6)-[:WATCHED {rating: 4.5}]->(oCorvo),

// RELATED_TO
(user6)-[:RELATED_TO]->(suspense);
